title: Short-Intensive Course on Machine Learning-Based Vibration Neural Network Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic electronics, neural network theory, and Python programming experience
context.additional_context: Supporting smartphone-based mobile learning environments, with enhanced practical training through VR simulations

learning_goals: The basic principles of Oscillatory Neural Networks (ONN) can be explained and circuit models can be constructed.
Practical exercises are conducted to calculate junction resistance values by applying the Backpropagation Through Time (BPTT) algorithm.
A multilayer ONN classifier can be implemented with machine learning-based design and its performance can be evaluated.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
